channel.title: Speaking of Mexico: English
channel.description:
This series discusses issues related to Mexican life, government, and culture. This is the English-language version of Speaking Of Mexico.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Broadcasting
item.description: This episode discusses the differences between broadcasting in the United States and Mexico.
item.dc:creator: University of Texas
item.dc:subject: Radio stations
